plot: The OC ladies come face-to-face for a dramatic reunion. Shannon and Tamra hash out their conflicting versions of events following Shannon's DUI. Heather confronts Katie on the paparazzi rumors before teaming up with Emily and Gina to grill Katie about recent shocking headlines, forcing Katie to defend her past. Jenn is placed in the hot seat when the group brings up details of the FBI investigation involving her fiancé, Ryan.
